name: Red and Blue (itch) (Arthurdevv)
description:
Red and Blue is a minigame in which you must open boxes that contain red and blue balls, which must be placed in their respective holes as fast as you can in 1 minute.

Project created for the 5th Winter Game Jam  

Game Engine: Game Maker Studio 2

PS: This is the first game I posted on itch.io, have fun ;)
